title: (x) Gardapat13 paper series promotion - Formata {Nicolai}
content:
This typeface is used for the for the promotion of a paper series called Gardapat13.  
I find it very nice but don’t know the name. Anybody knows?  
thanks in advance,  
jaysonR

If attachment doesn’t work it can be seen in:  
 [http://www.gardapat13.it/intro.asp](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111105356/http:/www.gardapat13.it/intro.asp)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [gardapat.gif](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=gardapat.gif) | 14.39 KB |
author: jaysonR

comments.content:
thanks nicolai, I appreciate it; after reading about it I realize its incredible use for  
logos (skoda)

jaysonr
